column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Quon says : " So , you 're the genius behind this incredible brew .
#Text=" Quon says : " But it does n't have to be the only reward .
#Text=How would you like to have your own tea shop ?
#Text=" Iroh says : " My own tea shop ?
#Text=This is a dream come true !
#Text=" Pao says : " What 's going on here ?
#Text=Are you trying to poach my tea - maker ?
#Text=" Quon says : " Sorry Pao , but that 's business for you , am I right ?
#Text=" Pao says : " Mushi , if you stay , I 'll make you assistant manager .
#Text=Wait , senior assistant manager !
#Text=" Quon says : " I 'll provide you with a new apartment in the Upper Ring .
#Text=The tea shop is yours to do whatever you want , complete creative freedom .
#Text=" Iroh says : " I even get to name the shop ?
#Text=" Quon says : " Of course !
#Text=" Pao says : " Uh , senior executive assistant manager ?
#Text=" Iroh says : " Did you hear , nephew ?
#Text=This man wants to give us our own tea shop in the Upper Ring of the city !
#Text=" Quon says : " That 's right , young man , your life is about to change for the better !
#Text=" Zuko says : " I 'll try to contain my joy .
#Text=" Aang says : " I just finished dropping all the leaflets .
#Text=Has anyone come in with news about Appa ?
#Text=" Katara says : " It 's only been a day .
#Text=Just be patient .
#Text=" Aang says : " Wow , you 're right !
#Text=Patience really pays off !
#Text=Joo Dee ?
#Text=" Joo Dee says : " Hello , Aang , and Katara , and Sokka , and Toph .
#Text=" Sokka says : " What happened to you ?
#Text=Did the Dai Li throw you in jail ?
#Text=" Joo Dee says : " What ?
#Text=Jail ?
#Text=Of course not .
#Text=The Dai Li are the protectors of our cultural heritage .
#Text=" Toph says : " But you disappeared at the Earth King 's party .
#Text=" Joo Dee says : " Oh , I simply took a short vacation to Lake Laogai , out in the country .
#Text=It was quite relaxing .
#Text=" Katara says : " But then they replaced you with some other woman who also said her name was Joo Dee .
#Text=" Joo Dee says : " I 'm Joo Dee .
#Text=" Aang says : " Why are you here ?
#Text=" Joo Dee says : " Dropping fliers and putting up posters is n't permitted within the city .
#Text=Not without proper clearance .
#Text=" Sokka says : " We ca n't wait around to get permission for everything .
#Text=" Joo Dee says : " You are absolutely forbidden by the rules of the city to continue putting up posters .
#Text=" Aang says : " We do n't care about the rules and we 're not asking permission !
#Text=We 're finding Appa on our own and you should just stay out of our way !
#Text=" Sokka says : " That might come back to bite us in the blubber .
#Text=" Aang says : " I do n't care !
#Text=From now on , we do whatever it takes to find Appa !
#Text=" Toph says : " Yeah , let 's break some rules !
#Text="
